title: RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE HONORABLE MAYOR NEIL ANDREW N. NOCON, HONORABLE VICE MAYOR MARLO PJ A. ALIPON, MUNICIPAL ADMINISTRATOR ATTY. VIRGILIO A. TIONGSON, JR. AND MUNICIPAL TREASURER MARIA LUISA G. DIAZ TO BE THE AUTHORIZED SIGNATORIES ON THE DISBURSEMENTS AND DO OTHER BANKING TRANSACTIONS IN BEHALF OF THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS WITH LAND BANK OF THE PHILIPPINES - LOS BANOS BRANCH.
